**Tender Announcement** 
### [Title]
01804-230332: Forage Harvester
### Reference Number
WS4071939433-Doc4407000442
### Solicitation Number
WS4071939433
### Publication Date
February 15, 2024

#### Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food, invites offers to provide a plot forage harvester. This project aims to provide one (1) single plot forage harvester, equipped with a diesel engine, cutting tables, weight chamber and sub-sampler.

#### Scope of Work

The forage harvester will be used for harvesting crops from fields of the AAFC's Nappan Experimental Farm in Kentville, Nova Scotia, Canada.

#### Requirement

• The successful contractor shall provide a forage harvester that meets the requirements outlined in the solicitation.
• The contractor shall successfully deliver the forage harvester to the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food in Kentville, Nova Scotia, Canada.
• The contractor shall ensure that the forage harvester is properly maintained and serviced during the contract period.

#### Important Dates

* Request for Proposal (RFP) – opened on February 15, 2024
* Closing Date for Bids – March 1, 2024 at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date – March 1, 2024
* Selection Criteria – The lowest bid price will be the basis for awarding the contract.

#### Response Details
If you are interested in participating, please visit the [Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18803043?extsite=MTg4MDMwNDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) on the codesource.
